name: Dick Dickster
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Dick Dickster is a drunk with a big ego, a bad attitude, he's broke and unemployable. Oh, did we mention his wife is divorcing him and he owes the mob fifty grand? When Dick discovers a hit man has been sent to collect, Dick goes on a wild journey to dig his life out of this hole… First he decides to make a porn film, but instead finds himself in the middle of a Cult of Doom death trap!
about_the_game: Dick Dickster is a drunk with a big ego, a bad attitude, he's broke and unemployable. Oh, did we mention his wife is divorcing him and he owes the mob fifty grand? When Dick discovers a hit man has been sent to collect, Dick goes on a wild journey to dig his life out of this hole… First he decides to make a porn film, but instead finds himself in the middle of a Cult of Doom death trap!
short_description: Broke, chased by the mob and single. Everybody wants Dick Dickster.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
